class.name: B4R::B4RESP3228CYD
class.event: Touch (x As ULong, y As ULong)

property.name: DisplayRotation
property.comment: Set display rotation 4 directions 0 - 3. 0=vertical (power supply top right),1=horizontal (power supply top left), 2=vertical (power supply bottom left), 3=horizontal (power supply bottom right), (rotations 4 to 7, image will be mirrored.) rotation - Byte 0 - 3

property.name: Font
property.comment: Set or get the font type. The font size is given at the end of the font name. Recommend to set the font size in f.e. DrawText to 1 to use the font size set by the selected font. Example: lcd.Font = lcd.FONT_ORBITRON_LIGHT_24 lcd.DrawText(lcd.Width/2, lcd.Height/2, Settings.MSG_WAITING, lcd.TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLE_CENTER, 1, lcd.COLOR_BLACK, lcd.BackgroundColor) lcd.Font = lcd.FONT_DEFAULT

property.name: RGBLEDRed
property.comment: Set or get the value 0 (OFF) - 255 (ON) of the RED LED.

property.name: RGBLEDGreen
property.comment: Set or get the value 0 (OFF) - 255 (ON) of the GREEN LED.

property.name: RGBLEDBlue
property.comment: Set or get the value 0 (OFF) - 255 (ON) of the BLUE LED.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the ESP3228CYD object with touch event. TouchSub (SubVoidTouch) - Name of the touch event. Set NULL to disable touch.

method.name: Clear
method.comment: Clear the screen.

method.name: ClearSetColor
method.comment: Clear the display and set background color.

method.name: ClearArea
method.comment: Clear rect area of the display.

method.name: Height
method.comment: Get display height.

method.name: Width
method.comment: Get display width.

method.name: SetCursor
method.comment: Set the cursor at x,y position.

method.name: SetBrightness
method.comment: Set the backlight brightness in the range 0-255. brightness - Byte 0 (low) - 255 (high)

method.name: FillScreen
method.comment: Fill the screen with color, i.e. set background color.

method.name: SetTextColor
method.comment: Set the text color. color - ULong, use constants TFT_color or ColorRGB(R,G,B)

method.name: SetTextSize
method.comment: Set the textsize. size - Double, size 1 is 8x8 px

method.name: SetTextDatum
method.comment: Set text datum.

method.name: Print
method.comment: Print string at cursor position.

method.name: Println
method.comment: Print string with linebreak at cursor position.

method.name: DrawText
method.comment: Draw text at x,y position with text size, color and backgroundcolor (set to COLOR_DEFAULT to use previous color defined).

method.name: TextLength
method.comment: Get the text number of characters.

method.name: TextWidth
method.comment: Get the text width in px for the selected font.

method.name: TextWidthDefault
method.comment: Get the text width in px for the default font 8x8.

method.name: TextHeight
method.comment: Get the text height in px.

method.name: FontHeight
method.comment: Get font heigth in px. font - (Byte) size, 1 is default 8x8 px

method.name: FontWidth
method.comment: Get font width in px. font - (Byte) size, 1 is default 8x8 px

method.name: SetColorDepth
method.comment: Set color mode. bits 16 - RGB565 Faster, red and blue tones are 5 bits. bits 24 - RGB888 Slower, gradation expression is cleaner. Note: bits 24 number colors displayed depends on hardware and may be 18 bits (RGB666).

method.name: SetColor
method.comment: Set color using constant, like TFT_BLUE. color - ULong

method.name: SetColorRGB
method.comment: Set color using R-G-B. r red g green b blue

method.name: Color332
method.comment: Converts RGB information to 8-bit color code. r red g green b blue return 8-bit color code

method.name: Color565
method.comment: Converts RGB information to 16-bit color code. r red g green b blue return 16-bit color code

method.name: Color888
method.comment: Converts RGB information to 24-bit color code. This function is recommended. r red g green b blue return 24-bit color code

method.name: ColorRGB
method.comment: Converts RGB information to 24-bit color code. This function is recommended. r red g green b blue return 24-bit color code

method.name: Color16to24
method.comment: Convert 16-bit (565) to 24-bit (888) color code.

method.name: BeginTransaction
method.comment: Secure SPI bus.

method.name: EndTransaction
method.comment: Release SPI bus.

method.name: StartWrite
method.comment: In case drawing speed is important, use startWrite and endWrite before and after the drawing process. transaction (boolean) - If true, transaction processing is performed.

method.name: EndWrite
method.comment: In case drawing speed is important, use startWrite and endWrite before and after the drawing process.

method.name: DrawPixel
method.comment: Draw pixel with size 1x1.

method.name: DrawPixelSize
method.comment: Draw pixel with size, like 4x4, 8x8 etc.

method.name: DrawPixel4
method.comment: Draw pixel with size 4x4.

method.name: DrawPixel8
method.comment: Draw pixel with size 8x8.

method.name: DrawPixel16
method.comment: Draw pixel with size 16x16.

method.name: DrawBezier3
method.comment: 3-point Bezier

method.name: DrawBezier4
method.comment: 4-point Bezier

method.name: DrawTextBox
method.comment: TEXTBOX

method.name: DrawGauge
method.comment: GAUGE

method.name: CreatePNG
method.comment: EXPORT SCREENSHOT TODO: PNG created is empty. Cause not found.

method.name: SetRGBLEDColor
method.comment: Set the color of the RGB LED. redValue (int) - 0 (OFF) - 255 (ON) greenValue (int) - 0 (OFF) - 255 (ON) blueValue (int) - 0 (OFF) - 255 (ON)

method.name: SetRGBLEDOff
method.comment: Set RGB LED off (color black).

method.name: DrawBitmap
method.comment: Draw Bitmap any size. TODO: Define the bitmap structure.

method.name: DrawIcon
method.comment: Draw an icon from an byte array.

field.name: B4RESP3228CYD_COLOR_BLACK
field.comment: Colors 16-bits to 24-bits converted from the library color list

field.name: COLOR_DEFAULT
field.comment: Color use the default set (like for DrawText) - note the additional F to indentify this color
